sentences.sContent: Chronic portal hypertension may lead to development of collateral circulation , which is manifested as caput medusa in the region of the umbilicus and epigastrium.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chronic portal hypertension may lead to development of collateral circulation , which is manifested as caput medusa in the region of the umbilicus and epigastrium.
sentences.sCn: 慢性门脉高压可导致侧枝循环建立，可出现脐部和上腹部局部水母头样改变。
